# Ray CI conditional testing rule definition file
#
# This file provides base tag (lint) that apply to ALL files.
# It is evaluated independently from other rule files, and tags are unioned.
#
#   ! tag1 tag2 tag3  # Declares a tag. A tag must be declared first to be used.
#   dir/              # Directory to match
#   file              # File to match
#   dir/*.py          # Pattern to match
#   @ tag1 tag2 tag3  # Tags to emit for a rule
#   ;                 # Semicolon to separate rules

! lint

*
@ lint
;
